'''Mike "Gandalf" Ganderson''' is a character on ''[[Friends]]'' who was never seen, but mentioned a lot in "[[The One Where They're Going To Party]]". He is supposedly a "party animal" who gets [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] in different crazy situations on nights out.

==Trivia==
The character [[Ben Geller]] was played in season 2 by a baby actor named Mike Gunderson.
